articles.author: NANCY LAPID, Reuters
articles.title: Pandemic cuts life expectancy by most since WWII - GMA News Online
articles.description: The COVID-19 pandemic has reduced life expectancy in 2020 by the largest amount since World War II, with the life expectancy of American men dropping by more than two years, according to new data.
articles.content:

articles.title: Biden receives vaccine ‘booster’ as confusion continues over third dose - The Guardian
articles.description: President receives public Covid jab after FDA and CDC carved out fewer categories than he hoped of Americans eligible for third dose
articles.content:
At the White House on Monday, Joe Biden donned a black surgical mask, rolled his shirt sleeve to his shoulder and received a third dose of the Pfizer Covid-19 vaccine as a booster shot.
